verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We bow before Your holy throne We lay our lives at Your feet, To be spent for You alone, Throughout all eternity.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Set our hearts aflame and purify our love! Let our lives proclaim Your majesty above! And as I gaze upon Your face, Let Your glory fill this place! (repeat){/lang-eng}
